question: Biju Patnaik Bravery Award was instituted by which of the following authorities of Odisha?
option1: Department of Sports and Youth Services of Odisha
option3: Department of Civil Defence of Odisha
option4: Department of Art and Culture of Odisha
answer: Department of Sports and Youth Services of Odisha
explanation: Biju Patnaik Bravery Award was instituted by the Department of Sports and Youth Services of Odisha. It is given annually from 2014-15.
